mapper.select: SELECT ot.order_date, ot.order_code, ct.client_name, it.item_name, oit.total, ot.transaction_type, wt.storage_name FROM order_tbl ot LEFT JOIN order_item_tbl oit ON oit.order_id = ot.order_id LEFT JOIN item_tbl it ON oit.item_id = it.item_id LEFT JOIN client_tbl ct ON ot.client_code = ct.client_code LEFT JOIN warehouse_tbl wt ON ot.storage_code = wt.storage_code

SELECT ot.order_date, ot.order_code, ct.client_name, it.item_name, oit.total, ot.transaction_type, wt.storage_name FROM order_tbl ot LEFT JOIN order_item_tbl oit ON oit.order_id = ot.order_id LEFT JOIN item_tbl it ON oit.item_id = it.item_id LEFT JOIN client_tbl ct ON ot.client_code = ct.client_code LEFT JOIN warehouse_tbl wt ON ot.storage_code = wt.storage_code WHERE ot.order_type = 1 AND ot.order_code is null
SELECT COUNT(*) AS uncheckedCount FROM order_tbl WHERE order_code IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_tbl ( order_type, order_code, order_date, e_id, client_code, storage_code, transaction_type, delivery_date, shipment_order_date ) VALUES (#{order_type}, #{order_code}, #{order_date}, #{e_id}, #{client_code}, #{storage_code}, #{transaction_type}, #{delivery_date}, #{shipment_order_date})
